title: Seal
description:
A gray seal with dark eyes and a dark nose. Most platforms feature a design with whiskers.

Can be used to talk about seals, marine life, or cute animals in general. May also be used in phrases with 'sealed' as in sealed with a kiss, my lips are sealed, or signed, sealed, and delivered.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the seal emoji presents a charming marine mammal with a sleek, dark gray coat and bright, curious eyes that convey a sense of gentle intelligence. The realistic lighting and subtle reflections on its wet-looking fur, characteristic of Appleâ€™s design, make it appear almost tangible. This emoji is often used to represent marine life, conservation efforts, or simply a cute and friendly greeting.
